projects.title: Blue Spark 2018
projects.summary: This application managed the check-ins for hundreds of attendees at tradeshow. It interfaced with a barcode scanner where booth attendants would scan the attendees for CRM follow-up.

projects.title: Presentation Download App
projects.summary: Customer desired to have a native iOS application that could download and play offline content of prepared speaking presentations.

projects.title: Tixers
projects.summary: Tixers is a third-party ticket marketplace for sports, music and other events.

projects.title: FlexKIT
projects.summary: The application features authenticated user management of frequently updated content. It is a solution for qualified speakers to access content and assemble presentations.

projects.title: Guardiant
projects.summary: Internal customized CMS-based site for Guardiant.

projects.title: Digi Deal Jacket
projects.summary: Created a platform for vehicle dealerships to desk deals, capture leads and upsell vehicle accessories.

projects.title: Universal Studios Photo Hunt
projects.summary: Leveraged work done with fōnhunt and adapted to an Events platform where Universal Studios can schedule and host Scavenger Hunts for park guests across 9 game instances in three different parks.

projects.title: Hunger Hub
projects.summary: This application commission provided search and identification of the various food banks and feeding sites throughout Central Ohio in cooperation with Hands On Central Ohio.

projects.title: Presentation Builder

projects.title: Braner

projects.title: Compressor Lubrication Solver
projects.summary: The application gathers information about compressor configurations and automates lubrication configuration and requirements for all components of the compressor system.

projects.title: fōnhunt
projects.summary: fōnhunt is a game platform where teams explore a setting to solve puzzles and clues using their own phones. Played either as a one time event, perfect for team-building, fundraising, or trade shows, or as an ongoing version to engage guests at venues such as resorts, zoos, or museums.

projects.title: Title not disclosed
projects.summary: Business developers and community are brought together in this platform to discuss wants, needs and desires.

projects.title: Hilton Explorer
projects.summary: The Columbus Hilton is home to many works of art. The Hilton Explorer is a mobile accessible app that explores the art and artists whose works comprise the downtown hotel's collection.
